verses.name: Hebrews 7:23
verses.text: And they truly were many priests, because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death:

verses.name: Hebrews 7:24
verses.text: But this man, because he continueth ever, hath an unchangeable priesthood.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:25
verses.text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:26
verses.text: For such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;
